markdownRemark.html:
Work

Itâ€™s my last month at SoundCloud. Iâ€™m making sure to pair on as many of my tasks as possible to make the handover as easy as possible. My days are split between the pairing sesssions and ad-hoc meetings in which peeps ask about some specifics on projects that I worked on a lot. I have the feeling those projects are in good hands now.

My anticipation for starting at Elastic is rising at the same time. They have just been announced the â€œBest Technology Company for Womenâ€ for the second year in a row which makes me super proud, even before I am starting there ğŸ˜…

Life

Berlin is transitioning into fall and itâ€™s as beautiful as it gets right now. The days are sunny, the trees are colorful and the parks are full with people basking in the sun.

It does get darker a lot earlier now and weâ€™re using the evenings to finally work on the home improvements tasks that we postponed due to wedding & honeymoon. We know the closest IKEA by heart now ğŸ˜„

After what feels like an eternity we now feel comfortable to drill into our ceilings. With some help from friends that are a lot more handy than us, of course. Which means we were able to install curtains everywhere and proper lights in some of the rooms. âœŒï¸

This week I will go on a 3-day hike in the Harz mountains. Itâ€™s my first longer hike in a long while. We used to go on 7(+) day hikes at least once a year but covid made travelling and accommodations more complicated so we skipped it this and leat year. I hope I am still fit enough to tackle the mountains weâ€™re planning to hike ğŸ•. (My next weeknotes will be delayed by a couple of days or a week due to that trip)

Entertainment

ğŸ“š Iâ€™m finishing book #4 in the Bobiverse series. In short, the series is about Bob, a Von Neumann probe exploring the universe. Itâ€™s written in a very humorous way, has plenty of hard science in it and some of the books are real page-turners. Book 4 is my least favorite of the series so far but itâ€™s still entertaining enough for me to want to finish it ğŸ¤“

ğŸ¿ Over the course of the last week we binged Sex Educaction season 3 and it was glorious ğŸ˜. Great continuation from the previous season, plenty of character development and an ending that makes me want to watch season 4 RIGHT NOW. Sadly it will be at least another year before the new season.

Song of the week
